revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "Herakles, son of Peteuchos, 12 dr.,;Apollonis, son of Herakles, 8 dr.,;Hatres, son of Paneousis, 4 dr.,;Panetbys, son of Nekpheros, 12 dr.,;Herieus, son of Sokrates, 40 dr.,;Peteuchos, likewise, son of Pouis, 12 dr.,;Apynchis, son of Marres, 12 dr. with an addition,;Peteuchos, son of Petosiris, son of Lakon, 8 dr. with an addition,;Petermouthis, son of Pnepheros, 8 dr.,;Phasis, Herakles, 12 dr.,;Sokmenis, son of Herakles, 8 dr.,;Mysthas, son of Ischyrion, 8 dr.,;Phasis, son of Themoyos, 16 dr. with an addition,;Harmiysis, son of Ammyneus, 8 dr.,;Pollous, son of Ptolemaios, 12 dr.,;448;2nd, Kollouthos, son of Onnophris, 8 dr.,;Petemounis, son of Teos, 4 dr. with an addition,;Hatres, son of Didymos, 4 dr.,;Herakles, son of Phasis, 24 dr.,;Polemon, likewise, son of Haterios, 4 dr.,;Herieus, likewise, son of Mysthas, 4 dr., ;Polemon, likewise, son of Harntotes, 4 dr.,;Zoilos, son of Pan.ose(), 16 dr.,;Haratres, son of Psenosiris, 16 dr.,;Onnophris, likewise, son of Senyris, 24 dr.,;Panetbys, son of Ammonios, 12 dr.,;Herakles, son of Hatres, 4 dr.,;Hatres, likewise, son of Diogenes, 8 dr.,;132,;3rd, Orsenouphis, son of Petemounis, 8 dr.,;Mithradates, son of Pasion, 8 dr. with an addition,;Harmiysis, son of Ammynis, 8 dr.,;Petearpsenesis, likewise, 8 dr.,;Ammonis, son of Herakleidoros, 8 dr. with an addition,;Ischyrion, son of the older Kallidoros, 12 dr.,;Pnepheros, son of Ptollis, 8 dr.,;Peteuchos, son of Nekpheros, ? dr. with an addition,;Horos, son of Petosiris, ? dr.,;Pason, son of Phaesis, ? dr. with an addition,;Lysimachos, son of Sambas, 8 dr.,;Aischrion, son of Herakleidoros, 8 dr.,;Peteuchos, son of Pako(), 16 dr. with an addition,;Herakles, son of Horion, ? dr.,;Kallis, son of Ischyrion []."
